Post-Match Reflections: Joel Embiid was involved in a physical altercation with a local columnist in the team’s locker room post-game.
Tensions are high with the Sixers team as the losses pile up, and fans become increasingly fed up with the lack of explanations from the organization.
The altercation was sparked by a previously published opinion piece that mentioned Embiid’s family, which many fans felt was unfair.
Joel Embiid expressed his anger towards the columnist for mentioning his deceased younger brother and his son in the article.
The NBA will be investigating the matter further, making it the second time this season that the league has investigated the Philadelphia 76ers.
